dateOfPublication.description: The date on which the demo was first published, in the form YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+00:00.

dateOfLastModification.description: The date on which the demo was last modified, in the form YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+00:00.

categories.description: An array of the categories that this demo is in.

tags.description: An array of the tags that the demo has. An empty array is allowed.

previewImages.description: An array of the different images that can be used as previews for this demo - e.g., thumbnails, social media cards (perhaps of different aspect ratios).

seoDescription.description: A description of the demo suitable for SEO purposes. Ideally this should be less than 150 characters, but this is not a strict limit. It should be a full, grammatically-correct sentence ending in a full stop.

canonicalURL.description: The canonical URL for the demo. Sometimes there might be more than one URL that points to a given page on a website. The canonical URL defines which of these should be thought of as the primary or main one.

references.description: An array of the references used for the demo.

basedOnPapers.description: An array of the DOIs for the papers the demo is based on. An empty array is allowed.

referencedByPapers.description: An array of the DOIs of any papers that reference the demo. An empty array is allowed.

relatedContent.description: An array of objects describing the content related to the demo. An empty array is allowed.
